title: 5. Variables
content:
## Variables Assignments

```kotlin
fun main() {
    //  Variable Declaration Explicit Type
    var myVar: Int = 1
    //  Variable Declaration Non-Explicit Type
    var myNormalVar = 3
    //  Variable Constant Declaration
    val myConstant: Int = 5
    //  Print Variable Value
    println("The value of x is $myVar")
    //  Variable Reassignment
    println("The value of Normal Var is $myNormalVar")
    println("The value of Constant is $myConstant")
}
````


## Variable Types
```kotlin
fun main() {

    val wholeNumber = 3
    val bigNumber = 3L
    val preciseDecimal = 3.3
    val decimal = 3.3f
    val isVegetal = false
    val isMeat = true
    val justaChar = 'a'
    // Division must be declared as floats
    val justaDivision = 3f/4f
    val justaMod =  10 % 3
    println(justaMod)
}
````






## Arrays

:::important
This is an inmutable list
:::

```kotlin
fun main() {

    val shoppingList = listOf<String>("Car", "Mosca", "As3s")
    println(shoppingList[0])

}
````
